entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow near the Ogilvie mountains overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
